name: LinkedOut
description:
The ultimate life connection simulation game.

Ever wondered how your life will pan out if you were to choose a different university course, meet and connect with different people, make different choices throughout your educational and professional life?

LinkedOut is a life simulation game that focuses on building connection. Through getting involved in extracurricular activities, connecting with industry professionals and earning your dream job by establishing rapport with your interviewer, you will be able to gain connections and increase your career prospects.

Will you make it into your dream field? Get LinkedOut and begin your own career from zero!

Game, Art and Music by Team InsaneTechniques.

-----------

Game Features:

-Extracurricular Activities: Join a club and work at a wide range of workplaces to increase your stats and build your connection.
-Bullet Hell Interview: Dodge the bullets while getting as close as possible with your interviewer to build rapport and pass your job interview! Remember to connect and message industry professionals beforehand to get their assistance.

Your ending will be determined by your soft skills, hard skills, while your connections (number of Super Super Rare (SSR), Super Rare (SR) and Rare (R) connections) will influence your ending score.

-----------

Detailed Instructions:

Profile: Add your activity for the period to gain stats (these can be unlocked by passing interviews in the job board).

  • Hard skills (Politics, Business, Creativity, Science): Affects career ending
  • Soft skills (People, Intuition, Motivation):
    • People increases connection increase multiplier,
    • Intuition increases skill increase multiplier
    • Motivation is your "energy". Beware when it goes to 0!

Message: Click and connect with professional that give you and upgrades your skill for the Bullet Hell Interview. (You need certain satisfy certain conditions to unlock the professionals).

Job Board: Apply and pass your job interview to access activities. You have to reach 30 reputation points to pass the interview.

Skills:
Ryan Tan: Increase long range reputation gain
Bear Andrews: Allows you to blink with cool down (Press space while moving in your desired blink direction)
Karge Minatozaki: Less reputation needed to complete an interview
Christina Titor: Lose less reputation points when hit by a bullet
Acerola O'Brien: Dismissal (Press space to destroy all on screen bullets)
